attributes.action: make st georges day april the 23rd  a bank holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the prime minister to make st georges day a bank holiday to celebrate our national hero st george

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SupportStGeorge/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
